code: import React,{createContext,useState,useContext}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactFormContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export function useContactForm(){return useContext(ContactFormContext);}export function ContactFormProvider(_ref){let{children}=_ref;const[showContactForm,setShowContactForm]=useState(false);const openContactForm=()=>{console.log('works or not');setShowContactForm(true);};const closeContactForm=()=>{setShowContactForm(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactFormContext.Provider,{value:{showContactForm,openContactForm,closeContactForm},children:children});}
